hero.subtitle: A UI/UX designer who enjoys turning messy ideas into clear, thoughtful, and meaningful digital experiences. Currently designing products at Arca Payments and leading design at Datafrik.

resume.title: Resume
resume.summary: I studied Computer Science, where logic meets creativity and empathy does the heavy lifting. I specialize in fintech, education, and travel products.

projects.title: Datafrik
projects.overview: Datafrik is an online learning platform that helps learners acquire practical data skills through hands-on projects and portfolio-building exercises. The platform supports structured learning paths, project-based skill application, and real-world problem solving to prepare users for data careers.
projects.solution_text: The redesign focused on clarity, engagement, and practical skill application. We implemented structured learning paths, project-based learning modules, and progress tracking dashboards to improve student retention.

challenges.title: Disorganized Learning Paths
challenges.text: Learners struggled to navigate courses and projects in a logical, progressive manner.

challenges.title: Lack of Practical Application
challenges.text: Courses were often theoretical, leaving learners unsure how to apply concepts to real-world problems.

challenges.title: Difficulty Tracking Progress
challenges.text: Users couldn't easily monitor completed modules or project submissions.

challenges.title: Limited Feedback
challenges.text: Learners lacked structured guidance, making it hard to understand mistakes or improve.

key_solutions.title: Structured Learning Paths
key_solutions.text: Courses and projects were organized logically with clear prerequisites and milestones.

key_solutions.title: Project-Based Learning
key_solutions.text: Assignments were designed to produce portfolio-ready outputs, ensuring practical application.

key_solutions.title: Progress Tracking Dashboards
key_solutions.text: Learners can monitor their completion status, project progress, and skill development.

key_solutions.title: Mentorship Integration
key_solutions.text: Mentors can provide contextual feedback directly on submitted projects.

projects.target_users: Aspiring data professionals, career switchers, and students seeking practical technical skills.

personas.name: Paul
goals: Learn advanced concepts without disrupting work

projects.title: AV Card
projects.overview: Avcard is a virtual card product that allows users to instantly create, fund, and manage digital cards for online payments. The platform focuses on speed, security, and user control.
projects.solution_text: We designed a seamless dashboard that allows instant virtual card creation and custom spending controls. The new flow prioritizes transparency, giving users clear visibility into their transactions and card status.

challenges.title: Frequent Card Declines
challenges.text: Users experienced failed transactions when paying for international services like Netflix and Apple Pay.

challenges.title: Limited Control
challenges.text: Fixed card limits and unclear balances made spending management difficult for power users.

challenges.title: Complex Onboarding
challenges.text: Existing solutions required too many verification steps before users could create their first card.

challenges.title: Low Trust
challenges.text: Unclear PIN flows and limited transparency caused hesitation around online card usage.

key_solutions.title: Instant Virtual Card Creation
key_solutions.text: Users can create new virtual cards in seconds without complex verification steps.

key_solutions.title: Custom Card Controls
key_solutions.text: Each card can be named, funded individually, and assigned spending limits.

key_solutions.title: Clear Activation Feedback
key_solutions.text: Users are clearly informed when a card is created, inactive, activated, or funded.

key_solutions.title: Secure PIN Transactions
key_solutions.text: Every transaction requires a 4-digit PIN, increasing user confidence.

projects.target_users: Freelancers, remote workers, and online shoppers who need reliable payment methods.

personas.name: Ada James
goals: Keep personal and work spending separate

personas.name: Tunde
frustrations: Lack of control over employee spending

projects.title: Airxplora
projects.overview: Airxplora is a travel platform designed to help users discover, book, and manage their travel experiences seamlessly. It offers international flight bookings, hotel reservations, visa applications, travel insurance, and local car hiresâ€”all in one platform. The platform targets both leisure and business travelers, providing a centralized solution that simplifies planning, booking, and managing trips while giving users confidence through clear information and trustworthy services.
projects.solution_text: The redesign focused on streamlining and centralizing the travel experience. We prioritized a unified booking flow, simplified interactions through progressive disclosure, and a centralized dashboard for managing all aspects of a trip.
projects.mobile_description: A mobile-friendly travel experience that helps users search, book, and manage trips with a centralized view of bookings, itineraries, and travel documents.

challenges.title: Fragmented Experience
challenges.text: Users had to switch between multiple apps or websites to complete a single trip booking.

challenges.title: Complex Booking Processes
challenges.text: Multi-step booking flows caused confusion and high drop-off rates during checkout.

challenges.title: Limited Visibility
challenges.text: Travelers lacked a centralized view of their flights, hotels, and other bookings.

challenges.title: Difficulty Managing Docs
challenges.text: Visa applications and insurance were disconnected from the booking flow.

key_solutions.title: Unified Booking Flow
key_solutions.text: Flights, hotels, visas, and car hires integrated into a single, coherent flow.

key_solutions.title: Simplified Interactions
key_solutions.text: Multi-step processes were condensed and made intuitive with progressive disclosure.

key_solutions.title: Centralized Dashboard
key_solutions.text: Users can view all their bookings, itineraries, and documentation in one place.

key_solutions.title: Support for End-to-End Needs
key_solutions.text: Key travel services like visa applications are embedded in the workflow.

projects.target_users: Leisure travelers planning vacations and business travelers managing work trips.

personas.name: Joy
goals: Book flights, hotels, and activities efficiently
Keep all travel details organized in one place
frustrations: Lack of clarity on total trip cost
Fragmented access to travel documents (visa, insurance, etc.)

personas.name: Tobe
goals: Track itineraries and essential travel documents
Minimize time spent on travel logistics

projects.title: Arcabill
projects.overview: Arca Bill is an internal billing tool used by the operations team to create, track, and manage bills generated for merchants and customers. The product supports day-to-day billing operations, payment monitoring, and issue resolution, acting as a central place where bills are raised and followed through to completion. The tool is heavily used by internal teams, which means speed, clarity, and accuracy are critical. Any confusion in bill status, ownership, or history directly affects operations, customer communication, and payment resolution.
projects.solution_text: We redesigned Arca Bill with a strong focus on operational clarity, speed, and control. Every design decision was guided by how the ops team actually works on a daily basis and the need to manage bills efficiently at scale.
projects.mobile_description: A responsive operations interface that allows teams to monitor bill statuses, search records quickly, and resolve billing issues efficiently while away from their desks.

challenges.title: Poor Visibility
challenges.text: It was hard to quickly tell which bills were pending, paid, or failed.

challenges.title: Inefficient Tracking
challenges.text: Ops teams relied on manual processes to monitor bills, increasing risk of errors.

challenges.title: Limited Context
challenges.text: Bill details didn't provide enough history or clarity for resolution.

challenges.title: Scalability Issues
challenges.text: As billing volumes increased, the existing tool didn't support fast filtering.

key_solutions.title: Clear Bill Statuses
key_solutions.text: Bills were structured around distinct statuses, making it easy to understand what action was required.

key_solutions.title: Centralized Monitoring
key_solutions.text: A single, well-organized view allowed teams to monitor all bills in one place.

key_solutions.title: Improved Context
key_solutions.text: Each bill was redesigned to show all relevant info (status, amount, timestamps).

key_solutions.title: Operational Speed
key_solutions.text: Filtering, sorting, and search were prioritized to help teams find bills quickly.

projects.target_users: Internal operations teams, finance reconciliation teams, and customer support.

personas.name: Dayo Lawal
goals: Track bill status without manual follow-ups
Resolve failed or pending bills efficiently
frustrations: Time wasted searching for bill details
High volume of bills during peak periods
